night.text: Mostly cloudy and mainly dry. Locally fog possible. Wind mainly around north 2-8, on coast in gusts 12 m/s. Air temperature -2..+3°C.
night.sea: Forecast for Baltic Sea valid 24 hours from 19:00 Nov 20 to 19:00 UTC Nov 21, 2018.Weather summary: High over the Baltic Sea.Warnings: no.Northern Baltic: wind around north 4 to 9 m/s. Locally some rain possible. Visibility mostly good.Gulf of Finland: at night north, northeast, around midday backing to northwest 5 to 8, in gusts 13 m/s. Mainly dry. Visibility mostly good.Northern Gulf of Riga, Moonsund: wind around north 2 to 8 m/s. Locally some rain or sleet possible. Visibility mostly good.
night.peipsi: Wind around north 2-7 m/s. Wave height 0.3-0.8 m. Mainly dry. Locally fog possible, otherwise visibility good. Air temperature 0..-2°C.

day.text: Cloudy with clear spells. Dry. Wind around north 2-8, on northern coast in gusts to 12 m/s. Air temperature -1..+4°C.
day.peipsi: Wind around north 2-8 m/s. Wave height 0.3-0.8 m. Mainly dry. Visibility good. Air temperature 0..+2°C.

night.text: Cloudy with clear spells. Dry. West, northwest wind 4-10, on northern coast in gusts to 15 m/s. Air temperature 0..-4, on coast locally to +3°C.

day.text: Cloudy with clear spells. Dry. West, northwest wind 4-10, on the northern coast in gusts up to 15 m/s, in the afternoon is drcreasing. Air temperature +1..+5°C.

night.text: Cloudy with clear spells. Dry. Wind mainly around west 2-7 m/s. Air temperature -2..+3°C.

day.text: Cloudy. Light rain or sleet is possible in places. West, northwest wind 4-10, on the northern coast in gusts up to 15 m/s. Air temperature +1..+5°C.

night.text: Cloudy. Light rain or sleet in places. West, northwest wind 4-10, at first on the northern coast in gusts up to 15 m/s. Air temperature -1..+4°C.

day.text: Cloudy with clear spells. Light rain or sleet in places. Northwest, north wind 3-9 m/s. Air temperature +1..+4°C.
